quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to PM Vishwakarma scheme?
1. In first year, 10 lakh families to be covered and a total of 30 lakh families to be covered over 5 years from FY24 to FY28
2. It aims to strengthen and nurture Guru-Shishya parampara or family-based practice of traditional skills by artisans and craftspeople working with their hands and tools.
3. Support only to artisans and craftspeople of rural areas across India will be provided under the scheme.
options: (A) Only 1
(B) Only 2
(C) Only 3
(D) 1 and 2
(E) All of the above

quiz.text:
PM Vishwakarma’ aims to support traditional artisans and craftspeople, which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to PM Vishwakarma scheme?
1. 2 types of skilling programmes - Basic and Advanced and a stipend of ₹500 per day to be provided to beneficiaries while undergoing skill training.
2. Credit Support upto ₹2 lakh (1st Tranche) and ₹3 lakh (2nd Tranche) with a concessional interest rate of 5% to be provided.
3. Total Financial Outlay of the scheme is ₹13,000 crore.
options: (A) Only 1
(B) 1 and 2
(C) Only 2
(D) 2 and 3
(E) None of the above

quiz.text:
The support to bus priority infrastructure shall not only accelerate the proliferation of state-of-the-art, energy efficient electric buses but also foster the innovation in the e-mobility sector as well as development of resilient supply chain for electric vehicles. Keeping this in mind Cabinet approved “PM-eBus Sewa” for augmenting city bus operations. Which of the following is/are correct with respect to PM-eBus Sewa scheme?
1. It Will generate 75,000 to 85,000 direct jobs through deployment of buses in city bus operation.
2. Cities to be supported for development of charging infrastructure under Green Urban Mobility Initiatives.
3. Central Government to be responsible for running bus services and making payments to bus operators.
4. Support to bus priority infrastructure shall not only accelerate proliferation of state-of-the-art, energy efficient electric buses but also foster the innovation in the e-mobility sector as well as development of resilient supply chain for electric vehicles.
options: (A) Only 1, 2 and 4
(B) Only 1, 2 and 3
(C) Only 2 and 4
(D) Only 2 and 3
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to PM-eBus Sewa?1. The scheme will cover cities of 5 lakh and above population as per census 2011 including all the Capital cities of Union Territories, North Eastern Region and Hill States.2. The Scheme will support bus operations for 15 years.3. Under this scheme priority will be given to cities having no organized bus service.
options: (A) 1 and 2
(B) Only 1
(C) Only 2
(D) 2 and 3
(E) 1 and 3

quiz.text: The Cabinet chaired by the Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi, has approved a bus scheme “PM-eBus Sewa” for augmenting city bus operation. Which of the following statement is correct with respect to PM-eBus Sewa?
options: (A) The Scheme would have an estimated cost of Rs.57,613 crore, out of which support of Rs.20,000 crore will be provided by the Central government
(B) The Scheme has three segments
(C) One of the segment focuses on Augmenting the City bus services in 181 cities
(D) The approved bus scheme will augment city bus operations with 20,000 e-buses on Public Private Partnership (PPP) model
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: World’s Largest Grain Storage Plan in Cooperative Sector” is approved by convergence of various schemes of multiple ministries. Which of the following is not one of the scheme converged under it?
options: Agricultural Marketing Infrastructure Scheme (AMI)
PM-Kisan Samman Nidhi
Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture (MIDH)
Pradhan Mantri Kisan Sampada Yojana (PMKSY)

quiz.text: Which of the following statement/s is/are incorrect with respect to World’s Largest Grain Storage Plan in Cooperative Sector?1.  Inter-Ministerial Committee (IMC) with Home and Cooperation Minister as its chairman and Ministers and Secretaries of Ministries concerned as its members for smooth and effective implementation of Plan to be formed.2. Creation of decentralized storage capacity ranging from 500 MT to 5000 MT at Primary Agricultural Credit Societies (PACS) level.3. PACS would be operating as procurement centre as well as Fair Price Shops (FPS).
options: 1 and 2
Only 1
Only 2
2 and 3
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: The Union Cabinet chaired by the Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi, approved theconstitution and empowerment of an Inter-Ministerial Committee (IMC) for facilitation of the“World’s Largest Grain Storage Plan in Cooperative Sector” by convergence of variousschemes of ministries. Which ministry does not belong to that group? (RBI GRADE-B 2023, PHASE 1)1. Ministry of Food Processing Industries2. Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare3. Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution4. Ministry of Cooperation
options: 1 and 3
1 and 4
Only 4
3 and 4
2 and 4

quiz.text: Which the following statement/s is/are correct with respect to objectives of the Pradhan Mantri Uchchatar Shiksha Abhiyan (PM-USHA)?1. One of the objectives of the scheme is to improve overall quality of existing state higher educational institutions by ensuring their conformity to prescribed norms and standards and adoption of accreditation as a quality assurance framework.2. New Model Degree Colleges in districts where there are no private institutions to be established.3. Employability enhancement through skilling and vocationalization to be done.
options: 1 and 2
Only 1
2 and 3
1 and 3
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement/s is/are incorrect with respect to the Pradhan Mantri Uchchatar Shiksha Abhiyan (PM-USHA)?

1. It would provide facilities for conversion of multiple-stream higher education institutions (HEIs) into single stream institutions.

2. Institutions would be facilitated to form alliances with Pandit Madan Mohan Malviya National Mission on Teachers and Teaching (PMMMNMTT) and University Grant Commission’s Human Resource Development Centres for Resource Sharing.

3. Multiple Entry & Exit system, Choice-based Credit System (CBCS), and Academic Bank of Credit (ABC) would be supported and prioritized.
options: 1 and 2
Only 1
Only 2
2 and 3
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Which of the following is not one of component under Pradhan Mantri Uchchatar Shiksha Abhiyan (PM-USHA)?
options: New Model Schools
Multi-Disciplinary Education and Research Universities (MERU)
Grants to Strengthen Universities (Accredited & Unaccredited Universities)
Grants to Strengthen Colleges (Accredited & Unaccredited Colleges)
Gender Inclusion and Equity Initiatives

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

1. The project covers 8 states/UTs, 47 towns & 12 rivers.

2. The program is being funded by International Monetary Fund.

3. The program would be implemented by the National Mission for Clean Ganga (NMCG) at national level.

options: Sewerage Treatment Infrastructure
Afforestation

River-Surface Cleaning

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to above programme ?1. Developing the villages located along the main stem of river Ganga which have historic, cultural, and religious and/or tourist importance is one of the objective.2. Current focus is on 3 major states on the main stem of river Ganga.3. Clean Ganga Fund (charity fund) established as a trust under the Indian Trusts Act.
options: (A) Only 2
(B) Only 1
(C) 2 and 3
(D) Only 3
(E) None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above Mission?

A. It is being implemented by Ministry of Jal Shakti.

B. It was launched in the year 2011.

C. It aims to ensure effective abatement of pollution and rejuvenation of the river Ganga.

A and C

A. Implement the work programme of National Ganga River Basin Authority (NGRBA).

B. Implement the World Bank supported National Ganga River Basin Project.

C. No additional work can be undertaken under any condition.

quiz.text: Under Emergency Credit Line Guarantee Scheme (ECLGS) Interest Rate on Guaranteed Emergency Credit Line (GECL) under ECLGS 1.0, 1.0(Extension), 2.0, 2.0(Extension), 3.0, and 3.0(Extension) capped as ___for Banks and Financial Institutions (FIs) and ____ for NBFCs.

Which of the following is/are incorrect with respect to part 1 of the  above scheme?
1. All borrower accounts pertaining to Business Enterprises /MSMEs/Loans to individuals for specific businesses purposes with total credit outstanding (fund based only) across all lending institutions of up to ₹20 crore as on 29.2.2020 are eligible.
2. Borrower accounts should be less than or equal to 60 days past due as on 29th February, 2020.
3. Up to 10% of their total credit outstanding is eligible.
options: (A) 1 and 2
(B) 2 and 3
(C) 1 and 3
(D) Only 3
(E) None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to above scheme?
1. Tenure of the scheme is from May 23, 2020 to March 31, 2023, or till guarantees for an amount of ₹2 lakh crore are issued by National Credit Guarantee Trustee Company (NCGTC), whichever is earlier
2. Loan for which 100% guarantee would be provided by National Credit Guarantee Trustee Company (NCGTC) to Member Lending Institutions (MLIs) is known as Guaranteed Emergency Credit Line (GECL).
3. No Guarantee Fee shall be charged from MLIs by NCGTC for Credit facilities.
options: (A) Only 1
(B) Only 2
(C) Only 2 and 3
(D) Only 1 and 3
(E) All of the above

quiz.text:
The Government of India, in association with State Governments, launched an ‘Invoice incentive Scheme’ by the name ‘Mera Bill Mera Adhikaar’ to encourage the culture of customers asking for invoices/bills for all purchases.
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to this scheme?
1. Initially launched as a pilot in States of Assam, Gujarat & Himanchal Pradesh and UTs of Puducherry, Dadra Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu (3 States and 2 Union Territories).
2. All Business-to-Consumer (B2C) invoices issued by GST registered suppliers to consumers to be eligible under it.
3. For each uploaded invoice an Acknowledgement Reference Number (ARN) to be generated which will be used for draw of prizes.
options: (A) 1 and 2
(B) 2 and 3
(C) Only 3
(D) 1 and 3
(E) All of the above

quiz.text: The objective of the Mera Bill Mera Adhikaar scheme is to bring a cultural and behavioural change in the general public to ‘Ask for a Bill’ as their right and entitlement. Minimum value for invoices to be considered for a lucky draw has been kept at ____.

Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to Mera Bill Mera Adhikaar scheme?
1. Maximum 50 invoices can be uploaded by an individual on App/web portal in a month to be considered for lucky draw
2. Every month, 1000 lucky draws with prize value of ₹10,000 each to be provided.
3. Duplicate uploads and invoices with inactive or fake GSTIN will be rejected by system.
options: (A) Only 1
(B) Only 2
(C) 1 and 3
(D) 1 and 2
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the National Pension System (NPS)? A. Ministry of Finance is nodal ministry of the scheme. B. It was launched in the year 2004. C. LIC is the implementing agency for the above scheme.
options: A and B
A and C

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the National Pension System (NPS)? A. Subscriber can exit only after completion of 5 years. B. The National Securities Depository Limited (NSDL) is acting as the Central Record keeper for the NPS. C. Contributions made towards the NPS are eligible for an additional tax deduction up to Rs 50,000.
options: A and B

quiz.text: Who among the following are not one of the beneficiaries under the National Pension System?
options: Any Indian Citizen, resident or non-resident or an Overseas Citizen of India between the age of 18 - 75 years.
All new employees of Central Government service (except Armed Forces) and Central Autonomous Bodies joining Government service on or after 1st January 2004.
All the employees of State Governments, State Autonomous Bodies joining services after the date of notification by the respective State Governments.
Private sector employees and unorganized sector workers
All of the above are beneficiaries

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to above scheme?1.On of the objective is to strengthen existing health information systems, by ensuring their conformity with the defined standards.2. Even though the scheme is a step in right direction, there is no provision to ensure national portability in provision of health services.3. It Supports integration of digital health infrastructure through various applications such as ABHA app, Aarogya Setu app.4. Adoption of open standards by all national digital health stakeholders to be enforced.

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is/are incorrect with respect to above scheme?
options: (A) ABHA(Ayushman Bharat Health Account) Number used for purposes of uniquely identifying persons, authenticating them, and threading their health records (only with informed consent of patient) across multiple systems and stakeholders
(B) It provides for assisted & offline mode for creation of Ayushman Bharat Health Account (ABHA) for areas with limited internet connectivity or hardware or both

quiz.text:

It promotes organic production through certified organic farming. 2. 500 or more farmers to form a cluster having 500-acre land to take up the organic farming. 3. B. Rs 8800/ha for 3 years for value addition and marketing that includes post-harvest management practices like storage.

1.It is implemented with collaborative efforts of Ministry of Panchayati Raj, State Revenue Department, State Panchayati Raj Department and Survey of India (SoI).

1. Apart from demarcation of individual rural property, other Gram Panchayat and community assets like village roads, ponds, canals, open spaces, school, Anganwadi, Health sub-centres, etc. would also be surveyed and GIS maps would be created

Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to features of  Smart Cities Mission (SCM)?

2. Making governance citizen-friendly and cost effective.

quiz.text: Smart Cities Mission (SCM) consist of certain fundamental principles, which of the following is not one of them?
options: (A) Community at core of planning and implementation
(B) More from Less – generate greater outcomes with lesser resources
(C) Cooperative and Competitive Federalism – cities selected through competition, flexibility in project implementation
(D) Technology as means, and the goal
(E) Integration, innovation, sustainability – innovating methods, integrated and sustainable solutions

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect Models of Area-based Smart City Development under Smart Cities Mission (SCM)?
1. Under Redevelopment (city renewal), planning in an existing built-up area to achieve Smart City objectives, along with other objectives, to make the existing area more efficient and liveable to be done.
2. Under Retrofitting (city improvement), replacement of existing built-up environment and enable co-creation of a new layout with enhanced infrastructure using mixed land use and increased density to be done.
3.  Greenfield development (city extension) introduce most of the Smart Solutions in a previously vacant area (more than 250 acres) using innovative planning, plan financing and plan implementation tools.
options: (A) Only 1
(B) Only 2
(C) Only 3
(D) 1 and 3
(E) All of the above

quiz.text:

quiz.text: With respect to the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph, identify the incorrect statement of the scheme if any:

Scheme also focuses on bringing about a behaviour change amongst citizens towards sanitation workers and enhance demand for safe sanitation services

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to above scheme? 1. Objective is to have atleast 50% of sanitation work performed by skilled workers. 2. The beneficiaries and their family will be linked with the social security schemes. 3. Focus on the formal workforce for the capacity building will be done under this scheme.
options: Only 1

quiz.text: Under the scheme, the funding support in form of fixed rate of interest and subsidy for new ventures will be provided to the beneficiaries. With regards to this information, identify the incorrect statement(s) about livelihood assistance that will be provided to the beneficiaries under this scheme. 1. Rate of interest chargeable on self-employment projects including sanitation related projects upto 1 Lakh is 4% for women. 2. Upfront Capital subsidy for individuals from 5 Lakh to 15 Lakh is 50% of the project cost. 3. Interest subvention for the rate of interest charged by the Bank over and above the rates of interest prescribed under the scheme is not admissible.
options: 1 and 3

1 and 2

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the PLI Scheme for Millet-based Products (PLISMBP)? 1. Incentive payable for a particular year will be due for payment in following year. 2. Applicant classified into 3 Categories. 3. ₹800 crore for incentives to Large Entity under the scheme.
options: 1 and 2
Only 1
Only 2
1 and 3
2 and 3

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to PLI Scheme for Millet-based Products (PLISMBP)?
options: (A) Objective is to increase usage of millets in food products and promote its value addition
(B) Packaged and Branded Ready to Cook/Ready to Eat (RTC/RTE) food products in consumer packs with more than 15% of millets by weight/ volume in product composition are eligible
(C) Primary processed millet commodities like de-husked/ polished millet grains, colour sorted millet grains and Millet Flours/ Atta are also included

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to Pradhan Mantri Kisan SAMPADA Yojana (PMKSY)?
options: (A) Financial assistance to undertake demand driven R&D work for benefit food processing industry to be provided.
(B) It was Renamed as Pradhan Mantri Kisan SAMPADA Yojana (PMKSY) in August 2017.
(C) It is a Centrally Sponsored Scheme.

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement is/are correct with respect to Pradhan Mantri Kisan SAMPADA Yojana (PMKSY)?
1. Under Integrated Cold Chain and Value Addition Infrastructure grant-in-aid of eligible project cost is maximum of ₹20 crores(per project).
2. Infrastructure for Agro-Processing Clusters has similar objective as Mega Food Parks i.e. to create common modern food processing/preservation infrastructure facilities for food processing/preservation units.
3. Grant-in-aid of eligible project cost under Creation of Infrastructure for Agro-Processing Clusters component is 35% in case of North Eastern Region (NER), difficult areas like Himalayan States/UTs.
options: (A) 1 and 2
(B) Only 1
(C) Only 2
(D) Only 3
(E) All of the above

quiz.text:

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Jal Jeevan Mission (JJM)?

1. Community needs to contribute 5% or 10% of capital cost for in-village infrastructure as the case may be, in cash/ kind/ and/ or labour.

options: (A) Only 1, 2 and 3
(B) Only 1 and 3
(C) Only 1, 2 and 4
(D) Only 3 and 4
